definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Is 1:22 drink, liquor;—only sf. [[סָבְאֵךְ]] Is 1:22; [[סָבְאָם]] Ho 4:18 (but v. infr.), Na 1:10 (but v. [[סָבָא]] );—liquor (appar. strong, choice) Is 1:22; ´[[סָר ס]] Ho 4:18 their liquor (i.e. their drunkenness) is gone Thes Hi Che RV:m, but very dub., LXX quite diff. (h(re/tisen Cananai/ouv), We Gu:Kau Now om. in transl.; conj. of Houtsma:TTijdschr ix (1875), 60 [[סׂד סׂבְאִים]], a company of wine-bibbers, makes good sense.
